message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this excellent product. Given its value and features, I'm proposing a starting price of $15,000.  I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.

I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I'm not comfortable with the initial price. I'm willing to make a counteroffer of $9,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and my budget.

Bob, I appreciate your interest and counteroffer. However, $9,000 undervalues the product's capabilities.  I'm willing to come down to $13,500. I believe this price point represents a fair deal for both of us.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $13,500 is still too high for me. I'm willing to make a counteroffer of $8,500. I believe this is a more reasonable price for the product, considering its value and my budget.
